attributes.action: Vote for MOT test fees to be increased.
attributes.additional_details:
The costs of operating an MOT bay have of course increased, but the fee we charge has not kept pace, the Govt consultation suggests a fee of min £ 72.50 

The DVSA are challenged by test stations working too quickly, we need an appropriate fee in order to allow appropriate time to conduct this important road safety task.
attributes.background:
The mot test fee has not increased since April 2010, vote here for a fee of a minimum of £ 85 

Vote for an increase now before we as an industry need to strike and cause more chaos for an already struggling economy
